word_mean: 敏感性，感受性，感觉，感觉能力：感觉和察觉的能力

sentence.Network_en: Everything he writes demonstrates the depth of his sensibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他笔下的一切都显示出他深深的感悟。

sentence.Network_en: a man of impeccable manners, charm and sensibility
sentence.Network_cn: 一个有魅力、懂感情、举止无可挑剔的男人

sentence.Network_en: You should marry intellect with sensibility in dealing with it.
sentence.Network_cn: 处理这件事时你应把理智与情感融合在一起.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 为对感性（sensibility）的辩护（justification），如果不是赞颂（glorification）的话。

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... sensible a 能感觉的；明智的 sensibility n 敏感性；感情 sensory a 感觉的，知觉的.
（三）情感 (Sensibility)培养学生遇到熟人热情问候的礼貌的行为。珍惜友情，多交益友。

有许多学者在进相关的研究,譬如全球通监测网(Fluxnet) 是许多研究单位在全球各地测地表的可感热(Sensible heat)、水汽(Water vapor)和二氧化碳通 ,并研究地表.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting the power of sensation): from late Latin sensibilitas, from sensibilis 'that can be perceived by the senses' (see sensible)

entry.def: Sensibility is the ability to experience deep feelings.

example.ex: Everything he writes demonstrates the depth of his sensibility.
example.tran: 他笔下的一切都显示出他深深的感悟。

entry.def: Someone's sensibility is their tendency to be influenced or offended by things.

example.ex: He was unable to control his sensibility...
example.tran: 他不能控制自己的过分敏感。
这一质疑伤害了他们的感情。

means.word_mean: 2. refined sensitivity to pleasurable or painful impressions;

auth_sentence.content: The mix of age and sensibility reflects his clientele.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mix of age and sensibility reflects his clientele.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mix of age and sensibility reflects his clientele.

auth_sentence.content: Simplicity is the sensibility at work in this cloister.
auth_sentence.res_content: Simplicity is the sensibility at work in this cloister.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Simplicity is the sensibility at work in this cloister.

auth_sentence.content: I have to find someone who matches my sensibility.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have to find someone who matches my sensibility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have to find someone who matches my sensibility.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ibility具备……性质的→adj.感觉[力],敏感性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明智的,达理的;可觉察的,明显的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ible能……的→能感觉的→明显的
sens感觉+itive……的→adj.[to]敏感的,易受伤害的;灵敏的
non不,无+sens感觉+e→无感觉,无意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 感觉, 感情, 感动
stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ation表名词→n.感觉, 感情, 感动
sens感觉+e→n.感官;感觉;判断力;意义 v.觉得,意识到

stems_affixes.value_cn: 敏感, 灵敏[度], 灵敏性

stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+e→n.感官;感觉;判断力;意义 v.觉得,意识到
sens感觉+ibility具备……性质的→adj.感觉[力],敏感性
conduct传导+ibility具备……性质的→n.传导性
flex弯曲+ibility具备……性质的→具备弯曲的性质→弹性
in不+fall错+ibility具备……性质的→n.绝对可靠
vis看+ibility具备……性质的→n.可见度,可见性,显著

means.word_mean: 识别力, 敏感性, 灵敏性

sentences.en: No one with sensibility would buy the book.
sentences.cn: 没有一个有鉴赏力的人会买这本书。

sentences.en: You should marry intellect with sensibility in dealing with it.
sentences.cn: 处理这件事时你应把理智与情感融合在一起。
